Resolution: Configured lab network and client DNS to point to DC; verified DC discovery and joined domain

Symptoms: User must change password at next logon not applying
Resolution: Disabled PasswordNeverExpires then enabled ChangePasswordAtLogon; documented setting

Symptoms: Need to block USB storage access
Resolution: GPO created to disable USBSTOR; exported GPO report
Added users to appropriate GG_* groups; verified Member Of
